channel.title: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!
channel.description: I'm having a problem with my Webclient and Clients. I try to log in and it says "no response from server". I checked many different server status checkers and it said it was online. Any idea on what i can do to fix it?

item.title: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Make sure the hid is set correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!

item.title: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

Your Webclient doesnt support your server that your using. If it was a IP connection error it would say “Error Connecting to Server”

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!

item.title: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Cool214 Cool214
item.description:
@Cool214 wrote:

It’s not the server thats down. It’s the webclients and clients. The status checker i used was instant. I tested it by turning my server on and off to be sure of it.

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!

item.title: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Is it your server? If so you’ll have to change the IP the client/webclient connects to, to localhost rather than using your no-ip like you did for everyone else.

If it’s not your server and you’re still experiencing problems connecting, that would most likely mean that the server is in-fact down. I don’t know how often the server status checkers update, perhaps you could run a port checker on their IP to get a more definitive result.

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient and Client issues. Please help!

I’m having a problem with my Webclient and Clients. I try to log in and it says “no response from server”. I checked many different server status checkers and it said it was online. Any idea on what i can do to fix it?
